channel.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant
channel.description: New Mexico's Foremost Webcastmasters and Musical Entertainers, the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Find us on the Overnightscape Underground at onsug.com !( www.myspace.com/letchmusic )bring you their music, sound-art and cultural commentary!! PQ Ribber is your host for short story readings, musical performances, babbles and pop cultural talk. To hear our old show go to http://poppedculture.podomatic.com !! For our short-casts (under 5 minutes) visit http://cofthei.podomatic.com !
channel.itunes:subtitle: 10 Minute Pop Culture Broadcasts
channel.itunes:author: conspiracy insignifico
channel.itunes:summary: New Mexico's Foremost Webcastmasters and Musical Entertainers, the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Find us on the Overnightscape Underground at onsug.com !( www.myspace.com/letchmusic )bring you their music, sound-art and cultural commentary!! PQ Ribber is your host for short story readings, musical performances, babbles and pop cultural talk. To hear our old show go to http://poppedculture.podomatic.com !! For our short-casts (under 5 minutes) visit http://cofthei.podomatic.com !

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Back n Babbling – (9/17/10)
item.description: New equipment!  The new Fall Season opens with a show highlighted with some Three Man Army, from their 1975 Deceased Album!  PQ  praises and reccomends  Peter Bernard’s New 418 Show, tells Nintendo/Famicon Fanatics to catch CHRONTENDO, projects the upcoming fun and yes, Billy Bob is coming back!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: New equipment!  The new Fall Season opens with a show highlighted with some Three Man Army, from their 1975 Deceased Album!  PQ  praises and reccomends  Peter Bernard’s New 418 Show, tells Nintendo/Famicon Fanatics to catch CHRONTENDO, projects the upcoming fun and yes, Billy Bob is coming back!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 9 Days 10 – (9/15/10)
item.description: The ten shows in nine days goal is reached!  4 Years in Truth or Consequences.  Why Bill Cosby will NOT be inducted in the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of Coolness and Legends.  The 1906 World Series and Mordecai 'Three Finger' Brown!  All this, some classic Bob and Ray, F Le Mur, and more!  Smile and enjoy!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: The ten shows in nine days goal is reached!  4 Years in Truth or Consequences.  Why Bill Cosby will NOT be inducted in the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of Coolness and Legends.  The 1906 World Series and Mordecai 'Three Finger' Brown!  All this, some classic Bob and Ray, F Le Mur, and more!  Smile and enjoy!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 9 Days 9 – (9/14/10)
item.description: PQ Ribber says a lot about nothing. Show counting, pop culture, Frank's 4 1/2 hour show and what it means to the future of Overnight Radio, plays program director, China(?), a terrible cover version, Mr F Le Mur, Conspiracy of the Insignificant as/is art - and suddenly another ten minutes of our lives have passed.
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: PQ Ribber says a lot about nothing. Show counting, pop culture, Frank's 4 1/2 hour show and what it means to the future of Overnight Radio, plays program director, China(?), a terrible cover version, Mr F Le Mur, Conspiracy of the Insignificant as/is art - and suddenly another ten minutes of our lives have passed.

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 9 Days 8 – (9/13/10)
item.description: The World Series of 1905 where the New York Giants demolished the Philadelphia Athletics is recalled. The man who's absence certainly caused this debacle, Eccentric Pitching Ace Rube Waddell joins the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of Wacky Celebs Who Should Never Be Forgotten. A new remix of our musical tribute to the great John Tolos and audio collage magic from Le Mur, too! Another fun and thrill-packed barrage of strange popular culture, Old News and dada from Truth or Consequences, New Mexico!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 9 Days 7 – (9/12/10)
item.description: Music fun and babble – The Old News Show and World Series will continue on this series – Posting some of these ten minute shows on Youtube to attempt to lure more listeners to onsug. Editing out the ums and ahs. Art Glut to be back soon. PQ demo of ‘Come on By’ – another 3 Man Army Classic and silly, probably too much reverb, as well. Gregor Sansa? Twink’s ‘Crayons’ makes it a double-shot of music. Fruitcake Toothpaste’s Art Show update! A vast amount of vague awesomeness in ten minutes!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

Twink’s ‘Crayons’ makes it a double-shot of music. Fruitcake Toothpaste’s Art Show update! A vast amount of vague awesomeness in ten minutes!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 9 Days 6 – (9/11/10)
item.description: Why do Ten Shows in Ten Days when you can do it Even Faster?? PQ Ribber explores the first World Series in 1903 – Obscure popular culture, Americana, and even some Old News! Another unusual 10 minutes from Truth or Consequences, New Mexico! Mr F Le Mur, too!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: Why do Ten Shows in Ten Days when you can do it Even Faster?? PQ Ribber explores the first World Series in 1903 – Obscure popular culture, Americana, and even some Old News! Another unusual 10 minutes from Truth or Consequences, New Mexico! Mr F Le Mur, too!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 10 Days 5 – (9/11/10)
item.description: Goopy Geer, the failed 1932 Warner Brothers Cartoon Star FAIL is inducted into the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of Show Business Glitches!  Art Glut update,  Presenting Programs and is it good? The elusive and ephemeral target audience, A PQ demo from the Providence, RI, era, NYC treks of the 80’s, – wow, you get a whole LOT in 10 minutes!!  Half way to Ten Shows in Ten Days!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

The elusive and ephemeral target audience, A PQ demo from the Providence, RI, era, NYC treks of the 80’s, – wow, you get a whole LOT in 10 minutes!!  Half way to Ten Shows in Ten Days!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 10 Days 4 – (9/10/10)
item.description: Thrift Store Score of a few 1941 issues of Family Circle Magazine is the focus of this episode! Pop culture babble with PQ Ribber and even a little dose of Dr F Le Mur!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: Thrift Store Score of a few 1941 issues of Family Circle Magazine is the focus of this episode! Pop culture babble with PQ Ribber and even a little dose of Dr F Le Mur!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 10 Days 3 – (9/9/10)
item.description: Third in the set of ten, collect 'em all!!  Truth or Consequences, Ralph Edwards, This is Your Life, Live TV, News annoyance, When Memory Dumps,Superman History Podcasts, Jack Kirby, Creative Frission...  PQ Ribber, spokescreature for New Mexico's ecclectic arts cult, the Conspiracy of the Insignificant, bravely fills your ears for ten minutes of yakkity yak and stuff!!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: Third in the set of ten, collect 'em all!!  Truth or Consequences, Ralph Edwards, This is Your Life, Live TV, News annoyance, When Memory Dumps,Superman History Podcasts, Jack Kirby, Creative Frission...  PQ Ribber, spokescreature for New Mexico's ecclectic arts cult, the Conspiracy of the Insignificant, bravely fills your ears for ten minutes of yakkity yak and stuff!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 10 Days 2 – (9/8/10)
item.description: PQ goes on a cantankerous babble on sports and what used to be. Some music from PQ and Doctor Panasofkee, ‘Sincere’, an insert from F Lemur, another urging to see Fruitcake Toothpaste’s Art Extravaganza, September 11th, 2010, at Happy Belly Deli, in Truth or Consequences, New Mexico, and all the between that fills another ten minutes of internet broadcastness!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: PQ goes on a cantankerous babble on sports and what used to be. item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – 10 Shows 10 Days 1 – (9/7/10)
item.description: PQ Ribber is back after a weird Labor Day pre and weekend that saw a PC bite the dust and lots of other wackiness with the first of TEN SHOWS IN TEN DAYS (If not faster!)  He tells you about a cool buncha Soviet/Bloc cartoons (catch em while you can), Bob and Ray and the vagaries of copyright and persistency of internet.  Music is played (Hayseed Rag by the Dizzy Trio with early Borah Minovich on the Mouth Organ) and PQ gives you an update on Conspiracy of the Insignificant visual art projects including Fruitcake Toothpaste’s show at the Happy Belly Deli, in Truth or Consequences, New Mexico!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Distractorama – (9/2/10)
item.description: PQ brings you music as his discombobulated brain takes a break! The Big Rock Candy Mountain and more! Sometimes a little distractorama is just what is needed when Mercury Retrograde occurs!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: PQ brings you music as his discombobulated brain takes a break! The Big Rock Candy Mountain and more! Sometimes a little distractorama is just what is needed when Mercury Retrograde occurs!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Pre Fash Consultants – (8/31/10)
item.description: PQ presents the music of Pre Fash Consultants, a band with direct lineage to the entire ongoing Conspiracy. We premiere their track, ‘As You Move Through Me’! PQ babbles about the Music Shift of 1978 and inducts Brann the Iconoclast into the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of Weirdness to Remember! Delicious digression in the easy to digest 10-minute package!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

Delicious digression in the easy to digest 10-minute package!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - New Chess and Guest - (8/30/10)
item.description: Where our pop culture has gone, Bobby Fischer and his New Game version of chess, and a literal surprise dispatch from the front as Conspiracy of the Insignificant creator and co-producer, Fruitcake Toothpaste calls in! All this and Bob and Ray, too as the Future and the Past collide and vibrate molecules for ten minutes of spifferiffic stuff!!

All this and Bob and Ray, too as the Future and the Past collide and vibrate molecules for ten minutes of spifferiffic stuff!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Mr F Lemur – (8/29/10)
item.description: Introducing audio collagist Mr. F Lemur and his work! Also a brief look at the Subgenius Foundation in this fun and funny sound sammitch of spiffiness!!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: Introducing audio collagist Mr. F Lemur and his work! Also a brief look at the Subgenius Foundation in this fun and funny sound sammitch of spiffiness!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Colonel Bleep Blip – (8/27/10)
item.description: 9:59 – More of the obscurest and deliciousest strange popular culture ever as PQ Ribber discusses Colonel Bleep, more spiffy retroriffic Outer Space Adventure from the depths of 1960s Kid’s TV!  A tribute tune to Jean Shepherd, ‘Whoopie World’ is premiered and then more obscure toons with The Mighty Mister Titan – Not enough??  There’s even another drop into the 1953 mindset!  Fun compressed and formed into another episode of the Universe’s Awesomest 10 Minute Broadcast!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: 9:59 – More of the obscurest and deliciousest strange popular culture ever as PQ Ribber discusses Colonel Bleep, more spiffy retroriffic Outer Space Adventure from the depths of 1960s Kid’s TV!  A tribute tune to Jean Shepherd, ‘Whoopie World’ is premiered and then more obscure toons with The Mighty Mister Titan – Not enough??  There’s even another drop into the 1953 mindset!  Fun compressed and formed into another episode of the Universe’s Awesomest 10 Minute Broadcast!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Starlost and 1953 – (8/26/10)
item.description: The 1973 Canadian Sci-Fi series, The Starlost, is remembered and while PQ gives you some cool rudiments, your further curiousity will appreciate this review of the complete DVD set.  This forgotten 70s classic that Harlan Ellison planned then disowned is certainly another addition to the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of Stuff and People that Shouldn’t Vanish.  Then, PQ turns back the clock to 1953 as he leafs through the December 1953 issue of Popular Mechanics with special Aluminum references!  The modernest 10-minute audio transmission in the universe!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Rivals Spanish Eyes – (8/25/10)
item.description: The obscure and apparently unusual 1972 film, “Rivals” is thrown into the air and babbled up, as well as some choice opinions on comedians.  A sort of double-review of this movie can be found here.  You also get to hear PQ and Dr Panasofkee as they conspired to attempt the cheezoid standard, ‘Spanish Eyes’.  Another fun and frivilous ten minutes from New Mexico’s badlands to you!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - All Star Marching Team - (8/23/10)
item.description: Inspired by ONSUG's (onsug.com) All-Star Get Togethers, here is a classic 1941 episode of Vic and Sade, one of the greatest and funniest shows, especially if you like your humor dry! Paul Rhymer's dialog is about as good as it gets! Enjoy this special episode and we'll be back to distorting your thought patterns with babble and music before you know it!!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: Inspired by ONSUG's (onsug.com) All-Star Get Togethers, here is a classic 1941 episode of Vic and Sade, one of the greatest and funniest shows, especially if you like your humor dry! Paul Rhymer's dialog is about as good as it gets! Enjoy this special episode and we'll be back to distorting your thought patterns with babble and music before you know it!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Music Clearence – (8/18/10)
item.description: Catching up and branching out – Gangpol and Mit, one of our favorite Creative Entities have been kind enough to allow us to play you their music, so PQ brings on ‘Safety Instructions in Case of Emergency’, then a Zappa Mini-Tribute (he would’ve been 70 this year) with Dr Panasofkee and PQ doing a quick instrumental run of ‘Take Your Clothes Off When You Dance’, then, as if this wouldn’t be more than enough stimulation to your auditory nerves, an assemblage of Don Ebel of Bethel Baptist church in Portland, Oregon, Three Man Army, and some Conspiracy of the Insignificant/Rubber Room Entertainment Lab Magic – ‘Entertainment’.  More of why this 10 minute broadcast may be the coolest thing coming out of New Mexico!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: Catching up and branching out – Gangpol and Mit, one of our favorite Creative Entities have been kind enough to allow us to play you their music, so PQ brings on ‘Safety Instructions in Case of Emergency’, then a Zappa Mini-Tribute (he would’ve been 70 this year) with Dr Panasofkee and PQ doing a quick instrumental run of ‘Take Your Clothes Off When You Dance’, then, as if this wouldn’t be more than enough stimulation to your auditory nerves, an assemblage of Don Ebel of Bethel Baptist church in Portland, Oregon, Three Man Army, and some Conspiracy of the Insignificant/Rubber Room Entertainment Lab Magic – ‘Entertainment’.  More of why this 10 minute broadcast may be the coolest thing coming out of New Mexico!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Panasofkee n PQ Play! – (8/16/10)
item.description: 10:00 – A quieter Art Hop Weekend in Truth or Consequences, New Mexico, led to some new recording with the Good Doctor Panasofkee, as well as Rubber Room Entertainment Laboratories introducing ‘Listen With Art Glut’ a new music series showcasing the weirdest Creative Commons music on Earth!  This show features ‘If I Could Have You For A While’ from the PQ Ribber/Panasofkee Summit over the weekend.
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: 10:00 – A quieter Art Hop Weekend in Truth or Consequences, New Mexico, led to some new recording with the Good Doctor Panasofkee, as well as Rubber Room Entertainment Laboratories introducing ‘Listen With Art Glut’ a new music series showcasing the weirdest Creative Commons music on Earth!  This show features ‘If I Could Have You For A While’ from the PQ Ribber/Panasofkee Summit over the weekend.

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant – Animal Stars 1897 UFO – (8/14/10)
item.description:
Ideas avalanche as PQ Ribber digresses madly about early (late 19th century) films, the Lumiere Brothers , the phenomena of animals as movie stars, like Rin Tin Tin and Rex the Wonder Horse, then a turn to the east and the Aurora, Texas UFO Crash of 1897 (NOT a typo), the latest mix from the Fruitcake Toothpaste Furby Project, then further ramblings on Rex, who becomes a shoo-in for the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of People (and animals) who are Too Strange to Be Forgotten!  Pop Culture condensed into a delicious 10 minute slice with no stale aftertaste!

 PQ Ribber
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: Ideas avalanche as PQ Ribber digresses madly about early (late 19th century) films, the Lumiere Brothers , the phenomena of animals as movie stars, like Rin Tin Tin and Rex the Wonder Horse, then a turn to the east and the Aurora, Texas UFO Crash of 1897 (NOT a typo), the latest mix from the Fruitcake Toothpaste Furby Project, then further ramblings on Rex, who becomes a shoo-in for the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of People (and animals) who are Too Strange to Be Forgotten!  Pop Culture condensed into a delicious 10 minute slice with no stale aftertaste!  PQ Ribber

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Fred Thomson Tetanus Tribute - (8/13/10)
item.description: Obscure Cowboy Star of the 1920's Fred Thomson is inducted into the Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of People Who Shouldn't Be Forgotten (maybe) - a man who stepped on the wrong nail and got tetanus! A new production and song from the Conspiracy - 'Be What I Wanna' highlights this episode! All this and the Brooklyn Bridge, too! Another exciting pop culture exposition from ONSUG and Rubber Room Laboratories, carefully contained into a ten minute audio dispatch!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

Another exciting pop culture exposition from ONSUG and Rubber Room Laboratories, carefully contained into a ten minute audio dispatch!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Tasty Yeast - (8/11/10)
item.description: Tell the truth: Did you ever imagine you would listen to a program that talks about a defunct and frightening failed food product like TASTYEAST? It had to happen. Also: another track from the lost vault, the first ONSUG host mix/collaboration is on the way (Bob LeMent of Morning Commute and Static Radio and PQ), and the usual babble that is integral to the Full Effect of the Universe's Greatest 10 Minute Broadcast.

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Furby Politics Music - (8/09/10)
item.description: A double-shot of new Conspiracy of the Insignificant demo/creations is the focus of this episode! You get the long-awaited sneak listen to Fruitcake Toothpaste's Furby Experiments as well as 'Just Say No To Politics' - a new and weirdie song addition to the COI Songbook! (lyrics below) The General and Xenon provide the guitar loop, courtesy Mentor Productions and the legendary Henny Henchman! Music and pop culture babble all in a 10 minute Power Pac of PQ Ribberation! Just Say No To Politics - lyrics (c) 2010 Conspiracy of the Insignificant Just say no to politics - Just a bunch of parlour tricks When You See them Urging Voters - They're Just Trying to Meet Their Quotas They Just Wanna Be In Power - They Will Make your stomach sour Just Say no to politics - Isnt this a ton of bricks? Bibble babble wasting time - Just another Party Line Rising up into a station - Representing corporations Just Say No to Politics - Give you candles, sell you wicks Tell you one thing then they switch - Kiss the asses of the rich They are just a bunch a wankers - They will bail out all the bankers Just say no to politics They are on their best behaviour - They will owe too many favors Funds from folks with such a hard-on - for a Presidential Pardon Just say no to politics - Somethings voting just cant fix Turning fiction into fact - Selling you the Patriot act Emptiness in Legislation - Diplomatic Masturbation Just say no to politics - Heaven is a lot like this

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Tetsujin 28 GIGANTOR - (8/08/10)
item.description:
The wonder and awesomeness of Tetsujin 28 - better known to us American Pop Culture Vultures as Gigantor is saluted and explored in this episode! Look what the city of Kobe, Japan has done!! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TA6nmhQPcvc !

A soundcollage minute tribute to this Mecha-Giant Robo legend, too! Old movies and film history online sites, and the true overwhelment of more material than anyone can digest! PQ Ribber, spokesmodel for New Mexico's Foremost Arts and Popular Culture Revitalization Service - The Conspiracy of the Insignificant hosts this awesome entertainium slab!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: The wonder and awesomeness of Tetsujin 28 - better known to us American Pop Culture Vultures as Gigantor is saluted and explored in this episode! Look what the city of Kobe, Japan has done!! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TA6nmhQPcvc ! A soundcollage minute tribute to this Mecha-Giant Robo legend, too! Old movies and film history online sites, and the true overwhelment of more material than anyone can digest! PQ Ribber, spokesmodel for New Mexico's Foremost Arts and Popular Culture Revitalization Service - The Conspiracy of the Insignificant hosts this awesome entertainium slab!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Microwave Entertainment - (8/07/10)
item.description: PQ touches on his addiction to the Wonders of Popular Culture and the times we live in, recommends the YouTube series 'Is It a Good Idea to Microwave This?', and even unveils a musical/collagerated tribute to the many objects 'Nuked' on this series. Fruitcake Toothpaste's forthcoming Furby project is also promoted as The Conspiracy of the Insignificant once again fills ten minutes of your life with sonic sunshine!

Fruitcake Toothpaste's forthcoming Furby project is also promoted as The Conspiracy of the Insignificant once again fills ten minutes of your life with sonic sunshine!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Kaiju Ultra Rocketship- (8/05/10)
item.description: More discussion and fun with Japanese pop culture giant monsters, Ultraman and (at least while this link works - ) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SDWg2xCXVRE Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legend The Movie!! Musical magic from the legendary pioneer tape band Three Man Army (courtesy Mentor Productions) - 'Rocketship'! New Mexico's fastest growing viral internet culture cult strikes again with ten awesome minutes of Entertainium!

Musical magic from the legendary pioneer tape band Three Man Army (courtesy Mentor Productions) - 'Rocketship'! New Mexico's fastest growing viral internet culture cult strikes again with ten awesome minutes of Entertainium!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Kaiju & Sabotage - (8/03/10)
item.description: Giant Japanese Monster Time at Conspiracy Central!! Godzilla!! A classic COI assemblage track 'Simple Sabotage Part One', Monster sounds and thoughts!! JET JAGUAR, too! 10 minutes of concentrated chaos to make your day more fun!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: Giant Japanese Monster Time at Conspiracy Central!! Godzilla!! A classic COI assemblage track 'Simple Sabotage Part One', Monster sounds and thoughts!! JET JAGUAR, too! 10 minutes of concentrated chaos to make your day more fun!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Sultry Rampling - (8/01/10)
item.description: Extra-babblesome edition as PQ hits the streets of Truth or Consequences. Pets, a stop at the temporary pond where a small wildlife zone has formed, promotion and the spiffy Conspiracy of the Insignificant Facebook Fan Collaboration Page are all touched on in this ten minute program. A little Shocking Baby Secrets as a musical lead-out, as well!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Otis Career Memory - (7/29/10)
item.description: A fun-filled, thoughtful, fast-paced episode on what the legendary Fred Allen called, so aptly: 'The Treadmill to Oblivion'! PQ reads a Julesworks, Otis Career mini-story, 'Memory' (co-penned by the soulful Stephen Rubin) and we get a dose of Full-Strength Conspiracy of the Insignificant with a unique 'Matchstick Mix' from the Dorky's Sessions! New Mexico's Creative Cult Collaboratorium!!

New Mexico's Creative Cult Collaboratorium!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - OoooTube - (7/28/10)
item.description: Extolling the virtues of YouTube and the many weird and fun things to be found there, including the amazing ART of Xul Solar http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IBzxbvrzFu0& Some more great sounds from the Bran Flakes and a call for you to offer us YOUR creations and get them on the show! Also: a thought for the future of Music on ONSUG! A splendid ten minute romp in your head!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Wet Desert - (7/26/10)
item.description: PQ Ramples around a little after a particularly intense rain in Truth or Consequences, New Mexico. If you listen carefully, you may even hear the noble song of the Desert Frog/Toad! Also: a rare recording of the Conspiracy of the Insignificant/Phydeaux III tune - (And the Wind Cries) Java! 10 Minutes of audio asparagus! (Whatever that means)

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Monticello NY Memhorrea - (7/25/10)
item.description: PQ remembers very random things about his old hometown, Monticello, NY and summer people and Day Camps and businesses that used to be... Also you get another Shocking Baby Secrets musical menagerie track! The world is saved for 10 more minutes!!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: PQ remembers very random things about his old hometown, Monticello, NY and summer people and Day Camps and businesses that used to be... Also you get another Shocking Baby Secrets musical menagerie track! The world is saved for 10 more minutes!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Laptop Terns - (7/24/10)
item.description: PQ Ribber, your host and presentor, discusses his digital art, (see some at http://conspiracyoftheinsignificant.blogspot.com and click to enlarge for the full effect) laptops and their foibles, plays you a superb track of Conspiracy of the Insignificantness - 'Terns', publicity and ONSUG, and again reccomends Food Party! Straight out of Truth or Consequences and sticking to the inside of your cerebral cortex!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico

Straight out of Truth or Consequences and sticking to the inside of your cerebral cortex!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Hoarders - (7/23/10)
item.description: The almost forgotten Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of People Too Weird and Cool to be Forgotten is revived and a new member is inducted as Hoarding and Eccentricity, Collyer Brothers Style is discussed. Pre-Conspiracy, Phydeaux III rarities have been unearthed and digitized as one of our comedic specialty songs, 'Santa Fe Arteeste', is presented, as captured way back in March of July of 1997 at Java Joe's in Santa Fe, New Mexico! All this compressed into another 10 minute mind mush!
item.dc:creator: conspiracy insignifico
item.itunes:summary: The almost forgotten Conspiracy of the Insignificant Hall of People Too Weird and Cool to be Forgotten is revived and a new member is inducted as Hoarding and Eccentricity, Collyer Brothers Style is discussed. Pre-Conspiracy, Phydeaux III rarities have been unearthed and digitized as one of our comedic specialty songs, 'Santa Fe Arteeste', is presented, as captured way back in March of July of 1997 at Java Joe's in Santa Fe, New Mexico! All this compressed into another 10 minute mind mush!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Bran Flakes PLUS - (7/21/10)
item.description: A much more 'Happy Musical' episode! With special permission, we bring you one of our kindred musical spirits, The Bran Flakes' "Blippo the Happy Clown", some vaguely cogent babble from our ditzy but productive host, PQ Ribber, as well as a quickie tune from the Shocking Baby Secrets archives! The best 10 minutes you ever wasted!!

The best 10 minutes you ever wasted!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Heat Affected Soundcast - (7/19/10)
item.description: A fried, but stubborn PQ Ribber brings you ponderings on perseverence, a VERY stompy-noisy electronic selection from the Conspiracy of the Insignificant archives about Embalming, with Fruitcake Toothpaste and Doctor Panasofkee! The photo used in today's program illustration is by noted Truth or Consequences photographer, Judd Bradley! A quirky but insistent program in this series of 10 minute mental enemas!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Dis Funk Shun All Whirled - (7/16/10)
item.description: The band, (indeed New Mexico's foremost musical conclave) play one of their big hits, live at the Happy Belly Deli patio, Art Hop, Truth or Consequences, July 2010! PQ then babbles about Facebook and mindless games! The most wonderful 10 minute internet broadcast available without special dispensation!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Beatle Day - John, Paul, Joe, and Tallulah - (7/15/10)
item.description: An incongruous and SPECIAL episode where we present when Lennon and McCartney appeared on the Tonight Show, somewhere around the famous trip to India. Sound quality is fairly reasonable and this is a classic!! Something extraordinary from the vast pop culture dungeons of the Conspiracy of the Insignificant!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Twisting Synchronicities - (7/13/10)
item.description: Another fast and fun episode from the New Mexico Badlands! PQ Ribber hosts, explains his theory of entertainment fun, presents the Conspiracy of the Insignificant performing a They Might Be Giants cover, then connects all the dots and sends you home dazed and amused - theoretically... Use Only as Directed

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Anhedonia Prospect Gone WILD - (7/12/10)
item.description: New Mexico's Foremost Musical Combination and Arts Collaboritorium is captured in performance from July 10th at the Happy Belly Deli! The songscape Anhedonia Prospect gets a new and hard-edged version! Original and startling music and the Universe's Most Awesome 10 Minute Broadcast is in your ears, again!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Phydeaux III Redux - (7/11/10)
item.description: The full-on sounds of the Conspiracy in their classic Phydeaux III configuration with drums by Joel! They play "Enough" and "Pornographic Glasses" and it is awesome! Also: PQ informs you about Food Party, one of the coolest TV shows, ever!! 10 minutes of incredibleness from Truth or Consequences to all!!

item.title: Conspiracy of the Insignificant - Fruitcake Toothpaste Visits - (7/8/10)
item.description: Co-conspirator Fruitcake Toothpaste is caught and he and PQ discuss the fun he had at work, the upcoming Conspiracy show this Saturday night, Tesla and the Spirit Radio and more! A rare track with Fruity and PQ and a mysterious pedal-steel guitar player provides unusual musical entertainification! 10 more minutes stolen in exchange for amusement!
